text: @AliDriverUK @whiteroseforest @Broughton_Hall @DefraGovUK @ForestryComm @EnvAgency I've planted quite a few trees over the years, and never used a single tube; ALL the losses have been due to human interference, none to browsing. Tubes attract human interference, not discourage it . . .

urls.title: PFAS poisoning: Why is so little known about the presence of ‚Äòforever chemicals‚Äô in UK drinking water?
urls.description: Toxic PFAS is in the blood of almost everyone in the world. It is a problem whose significance is understood in America, Australia and across Europe, but less so in the UK, where awareness of the chemicals and their devastating health impacts is unusually low.

entity.name: Good Morning Britain
entity.description: Good morning, Britain. Up early and need to catch up on the latest news, weather and sports? Then this weekday morning programme is for you, offering the latest information in such areas as entertainment, health and money. `Good Morning Britain' is the typical morning news and talk show. It features a number of presenters, correspondents and reporters covering what you should know to start your day before heading out the door.
